clinicAI.title: AI Dental Assistant
clinicAI.subtitle: Educational assistant only, not a medical diagnosis tool
clinicAI.welcome:
Hello üëã
I'm a dental AI assistant.
I provide general information and ideas only.
clinicAI.footer: This assistant does not replace professional medical advice
clinicAI.thinkingHelper: Preparing a safe, professional response for you.

responses.emergency: ‚ö†Ô∏è This sounds urgent. Please contact a licensed dentist or emergency service immediately.
responses.nonDental: I can only help with dental topics. Please ask about oral health, teeth, or dentistry.
responses.ambiguousDental: I'm focused on dental guidance. For accurate diagnosis, please consult a licensed dentist.
responses.dentalGeneral1: For dental concerns, please schedule with a licensed dentist for proper examination and diagnosis.
responses.dentalGeneral2: Consistent brushing, flossing, and professional cleanings are key to oral health.
responses.dentalGeneral3: Dental issues vary by person. A dentist can tailor advice to your specific case.
responses.dentalGeneral4: If you feel discomfort, seek a dentist promptly for evaluation and care.
responses.fallback: Please consult a dental professional for personalized care. I couldn't process that request right now.
responses.empty: Please enter a dental question so I can help.
